casebody.data:
BOLIVARIAN REPUBLIC OF VENEZUELA, et al., petitioners,
v.
HELMERICH & PAYNE INTERNATIONAL DRILLING CO., et al. No. 15-423. Supreme Court of the United States June 28, 2016.

Petition for a writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit granted limited to Question 3 presented by the petition.
